tika-abh06t11:8_0: Tattha nibbānanti bhavābhavaṁ vinanato vānaṁ vuccati taṇhā, vānato nikkhantattā nibbānanti
tika-abh06t11:8_1: ca pavuccati amataṁ asaṅkhataṁ paramaṁ sukhaṁ. Vuttaṁ hetaṁ “yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho
tika-abh06t11:12: Etaṁ ca nibbānaṁ nāma tayidaṁ santilakkhaṇaṁ, accutirasaṁ, assāsakaraṇarasaṁ vā, animittapaccupaṭṭhānaṁ, nissaraṇapaccupaṭṭhānaṁ vāti veditabbaṁ.
tika-abh06t11:13_0: Etthāha – na paramatthato nibbānaṁ nāma eko sabhāvo atthi, titthiyānaṁ attā viya,
tika-abh06t11:13_1: sasavisāṇaṁ viya ca anupalabbhanīyatoti? Na, paññācakkhunā upaparikkhiyamānānaṁ hitagavesīnaṁ
tika-abh06t11:13_2: yathānurūpāya paṭipattiyā upalabbhanīyato. Yaṁ hi puthujjanā nopalabbhanti, taṁ “natthī”ti
tika-abh06t11:13_3: na vattabbaṁ. Athāyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā “katamaṁ nu kho, āvuso,
tika-abh06t11:13_4: nibbāna”nti nibbānaṁ puṭṭhena “yo kho, āvuso, rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo”ti
tika-abh06t11:13_5: rāgādīnaṁ khayova dassito, tasmā rāgādīnaṁ khayamattameva nibbānanti ce? Taṁ na.
tika-abh06t11:13_6: Kasmā? Arahattassāpi rāgādīnaṁ khayamattapasaṅgadosāpattito. Kathaṁ? Nibbānaṁ pucchānantarameva
tika-abh06t11:13_7: “katamaṁ nu kho, āvuso, arahatta”nti puṭṭhena “yo kho, āvuso, rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo
tika-abh06t11:13_8: mohakkhayo”ti rāgādīnaṁ khayova vutto, tasmā tava matena arahattaphalassāpi rāgādīnaṁ
tika-abh06t11:13_9: khayamattatā bhaveyya, na cetaṁ yuttaṁ anuttarassa lokuttaraphalacittassa rāgānaṁ
tika-abh06t11:13_10: khayamattatāpajjanaṁ, tasmā mā evaṁ byañjanacchāyāya vadesi, ubhinnaṁ pana suttānaṁ
tika-abh06t11:14_0: Yassa pana dhammassādhigamena rāgādīnaṁ khayo hoti, so dhammo rāgādīnaṁ khayassa
tika-abh06t11:14_1: upanissayattā akkhayopi samāno “rāgādīnaṁ khayo nibbāna”nti khayopacārena vutto,
tika-abh06t11:14_2: “tipusaṁ jaro guḷo semho”tiādīsu viya phalūpacārena vuttanti veditabbaṁ. Arahattaṁ
tika-abh06t11:14_3: pana khayante uppannattā “khayo”ti vuttaṁ. Yadi rāgādīnaṁ khayamattaṁ nibbānaṁ bhaveyya,
tika-abh06t11:14_4: sabbe bālaputhujjanāpi samadhigatanibbānā sacchikatanirodhā bhaveyyuṁ. Kiñca bhiyyo
tika-abh06t11:14_5: – nibbānassa bahuttādidosāpattito ca. Evañhi sati rāgādikkhayānaṁ bahubhāvato nibbānassāpi
tika-abh06t11:14_6: bahubhāvo bhaveyya, saṅkhatalakkhaṇañca nibbānaṁ bhaveyya, saṅkhatalakkhaṇattā saṅkhatapariyāpannañca,
tika-abh06t11:15_0: Kiñca bhiyyo – yadi khayo nibbānaṁ bhaveyya, gotrabhuvodānamaggaphalacittānaṁ kiṁ
tika-abh06t11:15_1: nu ārammaṇaṁ vadesi, vada bhadramukhāti? Rāgādīnaṁ khayameva vadāmīti. Kiṁ pana rāgādayo
tika-abh06t11:15_2: gotrabhuādīnaṁ khaṇe khīyanti, udāhu khīyissanti, atha khīṇāti? Kiṁ panettha “khīṇesveva
tika-abh06t11:15_3: khayaṁ vadāmī”ti. Suṭṭhu upadhāretvā vada bhadramukhāti, yadi khīṇesveva khayaṁ vadesi,
tika-abh06t11:15_4: na gotrabhucittādīnaṁ nibbānārammaṇatā sijjhatīti. Kiṁ kāraṇaṁ? Gotrabhukkhaṇe rāgādayo
tika-abh06t11:15_5: khīyissanti, tathā vodānakkhaṇe, maggakkhaṇe pana khīyanti, na khīṇā, phalakkhaṇe
tika-abh06t11:15_6: khīṇā. Evaṁ sante bhavato matena phalameva khayārammaṇaṁ, na itare, itaresaṁ pana
tika-abh06t11:15_7: kimārammaṇaṁ vadesīti ? Addhā so ārammaṇaṁ apassanto niruttaro bhavissati. Apica
tika-abh06t11:15_8: kilesakkhayo nāma sappurisehi karīyati, yathānurūpāya paṭipattiyā uppādīyatīti attho.
tika-abh06t11:15_9: Nibbānaṁ pana na kenaci karīyati na uppādīyati, tasmā nibbānamamatamasaṅkhataṁ. Tamakataṁ
tika-abh06t11:21_0: Apica “nissaraṇa”nti bhagavatā vuttattā ca. “Nissaraṇa”nti hi nibbānassetaṁ nāmaṁ.
tika-abh06t11:21_1: Yathāha “tayo khome, bhikkhave, dhammā duppaṭivijjhā. Katame tayo dhammā duppaṭivijjhā?
tika-abh06t11:21_2: Tisso nissaraṇadhātuyo. Kāmānametaṁ nissaraṇaṁ, yadidaṁ nekkhammaṁ. Rūpānametaṁ nissaraṇaṁ,
tika-abh06t11:21_3: yadidaṁ arūpaṁ. Yaṁ kho pana kiñci bhūtaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ, nirodho tassa
tika-abh06t11:21_4: nissaraṇa”nti hi vuttaṁ. Evaṁ vuttassa tassa nibbānassa abhāvapattidosato paṭhamajjhānākāsānañcāyatanānampi
tika-abh06t11:21_5: abhāvo bhaveyya, tasmā ayuttaṁ akkhayassa nibbānassa khayadosāpajjananti, na tu khayo nibbānaṁ.
tika-abh06t11:22_0: “Atthi nissaraṇaṁ loke, paññāya me suphusita”nti ca “atthi, bhikkhave, ajātaṁ abhūtaṁ
tika-abh06t11:22_1: akataṁ asaṅkhata”nti ca dhammasāminā tathāgatena sammāsambuddhena anekesu suttantesu
tika-abh06t11:22_2: paramatthavasena vuttattā “atthi nibbānaṁ nāma eko dhammo”ti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṁ.
tika-abh06t11:22_3: Apica parittattike “katame dhammā appamāṇā”ti padamuddharitvā – “cattāro maggā apariyāpannā
tika-abh06t11:22_4: cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni nibbānañca, ime dhammā appamāṇā”ti vuttattā rāgādīnaṁ khayassa
tika-abh06t11:22_5: appamāṇattaṁ kathaṁ yujjati, tasmā paramatthato atthiyeva nibbānaṁ nāma eko sabhāvoti.
tika-abh06t11:22_6: Taṁ pana pakativādīnaṁ pakati viya, titthiyānaṁ attā viya ca sasavisāṇaṁ viya ca nāvijjamānaṁ.
tika-abh06t11:23_0: Atha paññattimattaṁ nibbānanti ce, tampi ayuttaṁ. Kasmā? Nibbānārammaṇānaṁ cittacetasikānaṁ
tika-abh06t11:23_1: navattabbārammaṇattā. Kathaṁ? Parittārammaṇattike ca pana “katame dhammā appamāṇārammaṇā”ti
tika-abh06t11:23_2: padamuddharitvā “cattāro maggā apariyāpannā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni, ime dhammā
tika-abh06t11:23_3: appamāṇārammaṇā”ti hi vuttaṁ. Yadi panetesaṁ paññattiārammaṇaṁ siyā, appamāṇārammaṇatā
tika-abh06t11:23_4: na yujjeyya, navattabbārammaṇapakkhaṁ bhajeyyuṁ. “Navattabbārammaṇā pana rūpāvacarattikacatukkajjhānā
tika-abh06t11:23_5: kusalato ca vipākato ca kiriyato ca, catutthassa jhānassa vipāko, ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ
tika-abh06t11:23_6: ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ kusalato ca vipākato ca kiriyato ca, ime dhammā navattabbārammaṇā”ti
tika-abh06t11:23_7: hi vuttaṁ, tasmā na paññattimattaṁ nibbānaṁ. Yasmā ca paṇṇattibhāvo nibbānassa na
tika-abh06t11:23_8: yujjati, tasmā maggaphalānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayabhūtaṁ uppādādīnamabhāvato niccaṁ, rūpasabhāvābhāvato
tika-abh06t11:23_9: arūpaṁ, papañcābhāvato nippapañcaṁ nibbānaṁ nāma atthīti upagantabbanti.
tika-abh06t11:26: Paṇītaṁ saraṇaṁ khemaṁ, tāṇaṁ leṇaṁ parāyaṇaṁ.
tika-abh06t11:35: Imehi pana nāmehi, nibbānaṁ tu kathīyati.
tika-abh06t11:37: Evañca pana viññāya, nibbānampi ca accutaṁ;
